select a.bookcode,b.roomcode,c.name typename, b.name roomname, b.type, b.howmany,b.howmuch, a.person,a.checkin, a.checkout,a.totalprice, a.name, a.mobile from booking a, room b ,roomtype c
where replace(a.checkout,'-','') > #{param1} and replace(a.checkin,'-','') < #{param2} and a.roomcode=b.roomcode and b.type=c.typecode and b.type=#{param3} order by replace(a.checkin,'-','')

select DISTINCT b.roomcode , b.howmuch,b.howmany,b.name roomname,b.type,c.name typename from booking a,room b,roomtype c
where b.roomcode in ( select roomcode from room minus select distinct roomcode from booking where replace(checkout,'-','')> #{param1} and replace(checkin,'-','') < #{param2}) and b.type=c.typecode and b.type=#{param3} order by b.howmuch
